full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO,, ,,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI RTZA RGYUD KYI GZHUNG LAS LEN PA DE NI SHIN TU BSDUS PA'I PHYIR, DE LAM CHUNG RGYAS NAS BGYI BA ZHES, AER TE NI TZAS SANG BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS ZHES BYA BAS NAN TAN GYIS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGO MCHOG GYUR, SKYABS GNAS DAM PA DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, BYUNG RGYAL DU SONG BA'I BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA LA LHAG CHAD LA SOGS PA'I NYES SKYON THAMS CAD BLA MA LHA DANG CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS KYIS THUGS BRTZE BAS BZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA DES BDAG SOGS 'GRO KUN DENG NAS BYANG CHUB MTHOB KYI BAR DU LAM BZANG GI RKYEN NGAN BAR CHOD KUN BZLOG PA'I GROGS PA'I MDZAD PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,)
